com.yy.transvod.player

类 VodPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yy.transvod.player.VodPlayer

  • public class VodPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A VodPlayer is a controller object used to manage the playback and timing of a media asset. You can use a VodPlayer to play local and remote file-based media whose container format is MP4.

    Permissions

    VodPlayer requires the Manifest.permission.INTERNET permission when used with network-based content and Manifest.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission for cache.

    Callbacks

    Applications may want to be informed of some internal state update and runtime errors during playback. Registration for these events is done by setting the appropriate listeners.All the callbacks be called in main loop.

    • setOnPlayerLoadingUpdateListener(OnPlayerLoadingUpdateListener)
    • setOnPlayerCachePositionUpdateListener(OnPlayerCachePositionUpdateListener)
    • setOnPlayerFirstVideoFrameShowListener(OnPlayerFirstVideoFrameShowListener)
    • setOnPlayerPlayPositionUpdateListener(OnPlayerPlayPositionUpdateListener)
    • setOnPlayerPlayCompletionListener(OnPlayerPlayCompletionListener)
    • setOnPlayerInfoListener(OnPlayerInfoListener)
    • setOnPlayerStateUpdateListener(OnPlayerStateUpdateListener)
    • setOnPlayerErrorListener(OnPlayerErrorListener)
    • setOnPlayerStatisticsListener(OnPlayerStatisticsListener)

    Usage

    The calling sequence of the class should be:

    1. VodPlayer()
    2. getPlayerView()
    3. setDataSource(DataSource source)
    4. start()/pause()/resume()/seekTo(long)/stop()
    5. release()

    • 字段详细资料

      • VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_EXTEND

        public static final int VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_EXTEND
        The content is stretched to the surface rendering area. When the surface has the same aspect ratio as the content, the aspect ratio of the content is maintained;otherwise, the aspect ratio of the content is not maintained when video is being rendered. Unlike VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_CROP, there is no content cropping with this video display mode.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_SCALE

        public static final int VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_SCALE
        Keep content aspect ratio. Unlike VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_CROP, there is no content cropping with this video display mode.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_CROP

        public static final int VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_CROP
        Keep content aspect ratio, may be cropping with this video display mode.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_0

        public static final int VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_0
        content rotate 0
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_90

        public static final int VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_90
        content rotate 90
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_180

        public static final int VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_180
        content rotate 180
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_270

        public static final int VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_270
        content rotate 270
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public VodPlayer(android.content.Context context,

        Instantiates a new Vod player.

        When done with the VodPlayer, you should Call release(), to free the resource.

        参数:
        context - the Context to use
        options - the Player options

        public void setDashLiveMode(int dashLiveMode)
        参数:
        dashLiveMode - DataSource.DASH_LIVE_NORMAL DataSource.DASH_LIVE_LOW_LATENCY 低时延模式会导致卡顿，但是可以降低直播的延时

        参数:
        avSyncStrategy - VodConst.AV_SYNC_DO_NOTHING VodConst.AV_SYNC_DROP_FRAME VodConst.AV_SYNC_FAST_DRAW

        public void setAvAlignEnable(boolean enable)

        参数:
        enable -

      • start

        public int start()
        start playback. if playback had been stopped, or never started before, playback will start at the beginning.

        If playback had been paused, please call resume() to resume play.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses playback. Call resume() to resume.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resume playback after playback has been paused.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop playback after playback has been started or paused.

      • release

        public void release()
        Release resources associated with this player. It is considered good practice to call this method when you are done using the VodPlayer.

      • seekTo

        public void seekTo(long time)
        Moves the media to specified time position
        参数:
        time - the offset in milliseconds from the start to seek to. When seeking to the given time position, there is no guarantee that the data source has a frame located at the position. when this happens, a frame nearby will be rendered. if time is negative , time position zero will be used. if time is larger than duration, duration will be used.

      • setNumberOfLoops

        public void setNumberOfLoops(int numberOfLoops)
        Sets number of loops.
        参数:
        numberOfLoops - A value of -1, which is the default, means to play the video indefinitely. Set 0 means to play the video once. set a positive integer value to specify the number of times to return to start and play again. For example, specifying a value of 1 results in a total of two plays of video.Set any negative integer value to loop the sound indefinitely until you call the stop method.

      • setAudioVolumeIndication

        public void setAudioVolumeIndication(int interval,
                                     int moreThanThd,
                                     int lessThanThd,
                                     int smooth)
        启用说话者音量提示
        参数:
        interval - <=0:禁用音量提示功能; >0 返回音量提示的间隔,单位毫秒,建议大于200毫秒
        interval - <=0:禁用音量提示功能; >0 返回音量提示的间隔,单位毫秒,建议大于200毫秒
        moreThanThd - 从=moreThanThd，立即回调一次 <=0无效
        lessThanThd - 从>=lessThanThd到
        smooth - 平滑系数，未实现

      • setVideoExtrasInfoEnable

        public void setVideoExtrasInfoEnable(boolean enable)
        开启回调自定义附加数据。默认关闭，播放视频过程中可调用，推荐播放前调用 开启后若媒体流中有附带自定义数据则通过VideoExtraInfo。
        参数:
        enable - 是否开启，默认关闭

      • setDisplayMode

        public void setDisplayMode(int displayMode)
        Sets display mode.if not called, the default video display mode is VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_SCALE

        The supported video display modes are:

        • VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_EXTEND
        • VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_SCALE
        • VIDEO_DISPLAY_MODE_CROP
        参数:
        displayMode - the display mode

      • setIsSpecialMp4WithAlpha

      • setRotateMode

        public void setRotateMode(int rotateMode)
        Sets rotate mode. if not called, the default rotate mode is VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_0

        The supported video display modes are:

        • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_0
        • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_90
        • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_180
        • VIDEO_ROTATE_MODE_270
        参数:
        rotateMode - the rotate mode

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration()
        Gets the duration of the file.

        When player engine state update to ready, you can call this method. Please implement the OnPlayerStateUpdateListener interface to listen to the state changes.

        返回:
        the duration in milliseconds, if duration is invalid, -1 is returned.

      • getVideoWidth

        public int getVideoWidth()
        Gets the width of the video.

        When player engine state update to ready, you can call this method. Please implement the OnPlayerStateUpdateListener interface to listen to the state changes.

        返回:
        the width of the video. or 0 if there is no video, or the width has not been determined yet.

      • getVideoHeight

        public int getVideoHeight()
        Gets the height of the video.

        When player engine state update to ready, you can call this method. Please implement the OnPlayerStateUpdateListener interface to listen to the state changes.

        返回:
        the height of the video. or 0 if there is no video, or the height has not been determined yet.
